bibl.title: Ethnicity in Hellenistic Egypt.
bibl.note: 8 papers presented at the Second International Conference organized by the Danish Research Project on the Hellenistic Period. - Inaugural Paper: Uffe ØSTERGÅRD, What is National and Ethnic Identity?, pp. 16-38.
bibl.seg: BILDE Per, Troels ENGBERG-PEDERSEN, Lise HANNESTAD and Jan ZAHLE (Edd.), Ethnicity in Hellenistic Egypt. (Studies in Hellenistic Civilization. III.)
Aarhus, Aarhus University Press, 1992, 8°, 210 pp. et 1 carte. ISBN 87-7288-359-6. 158,40 cour. dan.

8 papers presented at the Second International Conference organized by the Danish Research Project on the Hellenistic Period. - Inaugural Paper: Uffe ØSTERGÅRD, What is National and Ethnic Identity?, pp. 16-38.
C.R. par James G. Keenan, CB 69 (1993) pp. 88-91. - Csaba A. Lada, Topoi 4 (1994) No. 1, pp. 341-350.
